    def json(self, **kwargs):
        r"""Returns the json-encoded content of a response, if any.
    
        :param \*\*kwargs: Optional arguments that ``json.loads`` takes.
        :raises requests.exceptions.JSONDecodeError: If the response body does not
            contain valid json.

            # No encoding set. JSON RFC 4627 section 3 states we should expect

            # decoding fails, fall back to `self.text` (using charset_normalizer to make

            encoding = guess_json_utf(self.content)

    @allure.title("Создание профиля для текущего пользователя")
    @allure.feature("[API] Профиль")
    @allure.step("отправляем запрос POST")
    def test_create_profile(self, assertion, profile_api) -> None:
        fake = faker.Faker(locale="ru_RU")
        first_name = fake.first_name()
        last_name = fake.last_name()
        middle_name = fake.middle_name()
        city = fake.city()
        resp = profile_api.user_create(
            first_name=first_name,
            last_name=last_name,
            middle_name=middle_name,
            city=city,
            access_token=env_vars.ACCESS_TOKEN,
        )
>       assertion(resp.json()).should_actual_scheme(UserProfile)
